channel.title: Combat Code
channel.description:
I looked around, downloaded a few sources. Maybe I'm not looking in the right place, but I can't find it. I'm trying to find the way hits are generated in RuneScape. I don't mean Max Hit, I mean the code that generates the hit itself. I know it's some sort of combination of attack, strength and defense (of the opponent), combined with a random number generator. If someone could post the actual code for it, that would help me.
Thanks, wzaerreazw

item.title: Combat Code
item.dc:creator: @wzaerreazw wzaerreazw
item.description:
@wzaerreazw wrote:

Blah, okay, I’ll continue to look.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2008, 10:27:44 am[/size][hr]Still can’t find it. Is there a certain .java file you could point me to? Because I still can’t find it so far. I looked through all the files in RS2DV and I still can’t find the bugger.

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Code
item.dc:creator: @Torque1 Torque`
item.description:
@Torque1 wrote:

Well search around for a class file that may handle packets, or search inside of the main class. I’m unsure of which packet attacking NPCs is, there used to be a post with many packets.

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Code
item.dc:creator: @Torque1 Torque`
item.description:
@Torque1 wrote:

The attack packet as in the code that is being used to handle the packet, server side.

item.title: Combat Code
item.dc:creator: @wzaerreazw wzaerreazw
item.description:
@wzaerreazw wrote:

Attack packet as in the actual packet being transferred between the client and server, or a java file somewhere in the server files? Because if there’s a attack java file in the server files, I’m not finding it.

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Code

item.description:

Look in the attack packet of a server and learn from that.
